betterquesting:10.desc:8: Craft a template and you can receive your own copy of §6Materials and You§f§r!
You may notice right away some small piles of rocks lying randomly on the ground throughout the world. Break these and gather, they are a valuable resource. And needed for crafting tools.
Leaves will drop sticks. The drop rate is not great, but it will allow you to get sticks. Once we make a knife, we can use it to increase the drop rate for sticks!

Flint is essential for creating your first knife, the Crude Knife. You'll need to find gravel and either craft into flint, or break it until you get some.

Once you have obtained a piece of flint, you'll need to whack it on a piece of stone. Hold the flint in your hand and right click on the stone. This has a chance of breaking the flint into shards. This can fail, if it does, try again. Good luck!

The crude knife is essential in the early game for gathering plant fiber to be able to craft other crude tools. Once you have a knife, you can also get more flint shards from rocks.

NOTE: You'll need more than one to get started! Durability sucks on these things.

Also NOTE: §c§rTo consume §cHeart Containers §rsimply right click while holding. Extra heart!

Plant fiber is a new drop when breaking grass with the knife. You'll need plant fiber to craft plant string used in crafting both the Crude Axe, Crude Saw and bandages.

Now run around whacking grass until you have enough plant fibers to make some plant string. It will take three plant fibers to make one plant string.

The crude hatchet is used for gathering logs in the very early game. It is not a very durable tool and wears out easily.

Once you've gathered enough wood, you'll be able to create tool tables for Tinkers' Construct and be able to make a Tinkers' hatchet or mattock.

NOTE: You'll need more than one to get started! Durability sucks on these things.

Also NOTE: §c§rTo consume §cHeart Containers §rsimply right click while holding. Extra heart!
Wood is essential for creating your first Tinkers' Construct setup and tools. You'll need a lot more wood than this, but this will get you started and make sure you can survive!

The crude saw is a crafting tool, it can saw logs into planks, or planks into sticks. Just place above the item in your crafting grid. This doesn't consume the saw, just causes some durability loss. The crude saw has a very poor durability. It is recommended that you upgrade to the Tinkers' Saw as early as possible.

First, create shards from rocks. Place a rock and your crude knife in the crafting grid and create shards. You'll need 2 shards to create the saw blade.

Second, create the saw blade.

Lastly, craft the saw with the saw blade.

NOTE: You'll need more than one to get started! Durability sucks on these things.

Also NOTE: §c§rTo consume §cHeart Containers §rsimply right click while holding. Extra heart!
You'll need quite a few planks to build some storage and your first Tinkers' Construct setup. Just place the saw above a log in any crafting grid to convert logs into planks.
Craft an Armor Station to get copy of Armory Addendum.

Craft a Bed so you can set your spawn point. It is always easier when you revive in your hidey hole!

Also NOTE: §c§rTo consume §cHeart Containers §rsimply right click while holding. Extra heart!
Make and fire a clay bucket. Fill with lava for smeltery.
Get Engineer's Manual
To get the Animania Manual, you'll need to craft a lead, or buy one in the Market. There are a couple recipes, be sure to check JEI for the options.

This is a dark, sulphurous strain of wheat that literally emits burning embers. It glows from internal heat. While slower-growing than normal wheat, it can be used to make hay bales and bread, and even cookies! All Ashenwheat products will burn as fuel in any furnace which accepts standard fuel, and Ashenbread will smelt into charcoal. When harvesting, all crops become darker.

Note: Obtain seeds by breaking grass as a random drop.

This strange plant has a large, hard, bulbous, inedible root that looks vaguely like a skull. A torch can be set in the base to make an Ossid Lantern, similar to a Jack-O-Lantern, while a fresh Ossid Root can be smelted to Calcified Ash, which makes Bonemeal. Ossidroot grows a little slower than Ashenwheat. Ossidroot plants, and the Lanterns, emit an ominous gloom. When harvesting, all crops become darker.

Note: Obtain seeds by breaking grass as a random drop.

This thick, wiry grass produces more seeds when dried. The seeds can be smelted into small lumps of Unstable Soot, which can then be crafted into Gunpowder. Thundergrass grows a little slower than Ashenwheat. Thundergrass glows slightly, and smokes from internal heat. Thundergrass seeds do not have crafting table recipes.

Note: Obtain seeds by breaking grass as a random drop.

Scintillawheat is a rare and slow-growing wheat. It glows brighter than Ashenwheat, and shimmers even in the sun. It can be used to make hay bales and bread, and even cookies. Scintillawheat bales can be smelted to produce Scintillating Ash, which can be crafted into Glowstone Dust. When harvesting, all crops become darker.

Note: Obtain seeds by breaking grass as a random drop.

The ender crop has 8 growth stages. Harvesting it at any stage will drop Ender Seeds, at the 8th stage it will drop 1-2 Ender Pearls and sometimes an extra seed. On farmland growth rate follows Vanilla Minecraft growth rules but at 50% the rate of wheat. It requires light level <7 to grow (redstone torch). On tilled End Stone it grows at the same rate of wheat and will grow at any light level.


Note: Obtain seeds by breaking grass as a random drop.

A pickaxe is a necessary tool to mine.

The first level mining tool is §7Stone Level§r. Even though there are many materials mentioned in the list for this level, there are only a few that are realistic for getting your first Pickaxe. However, Slime, Bone, Cactus, Flint, Paper, Stone and Wood are all possible. Craft a Pickaxe Head in the Part Builder to receive your reward.

NOTE: §c§rTo consume §cHeart Containers §rsimply right click while holding. Extra heart!

An Axe Head is essential for creating the Hatchet, Mattock and Saw. You'll very likely want both a Mattock and a Saw. The Mattock can be used as a Shovel, Axe and Hoe! The Saw is essential as well, the yeild for sawn logs doubles from the Crude Saw, and is repairable. Create an Axe Head Pattern to receive your reward.

NOTE: §c§rTo consume §cHeart Containers §rsimply right click while holding. Extra heart!

A Shovel Head is necessary for making the Shovel and Mattock. The Mattock is recommended since it also can be used as an Axe and a Hoe.

NOTE: §c§rTo consume §cHeart Containers §rsimply right click while holding. Extra heart!

This is your primary quest! Complete this quest to have any chance of survival. Three hearts will be awarded once you've completed all of the tasks. Good luck!

Rewards: 3 Heart Containers

Get started with Tinkers' Construct. The book is an essential guide. Follow the guide and you'll be making your own custom tools!

Rewards: Materials and You Book, Clay Lava Bucket, 3 Heart Containers

Get a copy of the Armory Addendum.

Reward: Copy of Armory Addendum

Craft a bed to set your spawn point.

Reward: 1 Heart Container

Get a copy of the Engineer's Manual. This book also gives information for Immersive Petroleum in the Oil Processing section of the manual.

Reward: Copy of the Engineer's Manual

Get Animania Manual!

Reward: Copy of the Animania Manual

There are several specialty seeds to be found by breaking grass. These seeds result in a number of very useful crops for obtaining difficult to obtain items.

Rewards: 5 Ashenwheat Cookies, 16 Bonemeal, 10 Gunpowder, 5 Scintillawheat Cookies
